law.catch_line: The subtraction modifications for volunteer police, fire, rescue, and emergency medical services per...
law.text: The subtraction modifications for volunteer police, fire, rescue, and emergency medical services personnel under § 10-208(i-1) and (l) of this subtitle shall be known as the Honorable Louis L. Goldstein Volunteer Police, Fire, Rescue, and Emergency Medical Services Personnel Subtraction Modification Program.
